title: Nutrition Assessment Schema
description:
Database Schema for Nutrition Assessment System

Design and implement a comprehensive database schema to store patient nutrition assessment data, including dietary restrictions, food preferences, nutritional intake tracking, and overall nutritional status indicators.

Requirements:
- Create tables/models for dietary restrictions (allergies, intolerances, medical restrictions)
- Define food preferences structure (likes, dislikes, cultural/religious preferences)
- Design nutritional intake tracking schema (meals, portions, macronutrients, micronutrients, timestamps)
- Establish nutritional status fields (BMI, weight history, deficiencies, health markers)
- Include proper data types, constraints, and validation rules
- Define relationships between entities (e.g., patient-to-restrictions, intake-to-meals)
- Add fields for tracking assessment dates and update history
- Consider extensibility for future metrics or assessment categories
- Document the schema with clear field descriptions and usage guidelines

Edge cases to consider:
- Multiple concurrent dietary restrictions
- Temporary vs. permanent restrictions
- Evolving preferences over time
- Bulk intake logging vs. individual meal entries
- Historical data retention and versioning
